prompt:
Use case: chapter 1 cinematic beat
Primary request: A stylized teal sentinel passes a sealed scroll over a porcelain pedestal to symbolize ownership without access
Scene/background: minimal archival alcove with one central pedestal
Subject: teal sentinel figurine and sealed parchment scroll
Action: one deliberate handover move, then freeze
Camera: 50mm medium shot with slight arc right
Lighting/mood: soft top-left key, gentle mint fill, low contrast
Color palette: cream white, mint teal, charcoal blue
Style/format: premium minimal bas-relief cinematic render
Timing/beats: beat 1 raise scroll, beat 2 handover, beat 3 pause
Constraints: one action only, clean silhouette, no realistic human face
Avoid: crowded background, rapid motion, hard shadows
